testcaseName: Varicella: Zoster dose in lieu of  first dose of Varicella for adult patient
generalDescription: This test case describes when a ZVL vaccine dose is given in lieu of a Varicella vaccine to an adult less than 50 years, that the dose should be considered as a valid first dose of the Varicella vaccine.
reasonForChange: Past Due Date was updated to reflect an 8 week interval per ACIP guidelines after last administered dose.
